results.title: Simvastatin is Efficacious in Treating Cirrhosis: A Meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Idiopathic_Noncirrhotic_Portal_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094724 @@@cirrhotic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ lowers mortality rates by suppressing incidences of fatal @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@bleeding@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang H, Zhang Q, Li S, Xie B. Simvastatin is Efficacious in Treating Cirrhosis: A Meta-analysis. J Clin Gastroenterol. 2022 Sep 1;56(8):e303-e312. PMID: 35830548

results.title: Hemodynamic Effects of Adding Simvastatin to Carvedilol for Primary Prophylaxis of Variceal Bleeding: A Randomized Controlled Trial.
results.text_hl: We studied whether addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Idiopathic_Noncirrhotic_Portal_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094724 @@@cirrhotic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ for primary prophylaxis improves the hemodynamic response.

results.title: Successful treatment of lathosterolosis: A rare defect in cholesterol biosynthesis:A case report and review of literature
results.text_hl: Based on a previous case report, 5  we used @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ initially at a dose of 5 mg daily (0.2 mg/kg/day).

results.title: SACRED: Effect of simvastatin on hepatic decompensation and death in subjects with high-risk compensated cirrhosis: Statins and Cirrhosis: Reducing Events of Decompensation
results.text_hl: This proposal aims to extend these findings to demonstrate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces incident @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@hepatic decompensation@@@ events among @<m>DISEASE_Idiopathic_Noncirrhotic_Portal_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094724 @@@cirrhotic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ at high risk for @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@hepatic decompensation@@@.

results.title: Effects of simvastatin administration on rodents with lipopolysaccharide-induced liver microvascular dysfunction.
results.text_hl: This was associated with reduced @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_24600 @@@eNOS@@@ phosphorylation and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@liver inflammation@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ after @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ challenge did not prevent the increase in baseline portal perfusion pressure, but attenuated the development of @<m>DISEASE_Idiopathic_Noncirrhotic_Portal_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000094724 @@@sinusoidal endothelial dysfunction@@@.

results.title: Three months of simvastatin therapy vs. placebo for severe portal hypertension in cirrhosis: A randomized controlled trial.
